title: Refer a Client to Senior Services
description: A social worker determines that an elderly client needs additional support, such as meal delivery and transportation.

tasks.description: Identify the elderly client's case file.
tasks.expected_outcome: The social worker pulls up the correct case.

tasks.description: Assess the client's needs for additional support services.
tasks.expected_outcome: The social worker identifies a need for Meals on Wheels and senior transportation.

tasks.description: Make formal referrals to the appropriate partner agencies for these services.
tasks.expected_outcome: The social worker submits referrals to the local Area Agency on Aging.
